991790.name: Magnesia
991790.description:
In Magnesia, the character you play can use his hands to make a magnet positive or negative. He can do this by shooting his hands towards the magnet he wants to change. This way the magnet can attract or repel certain objects. This mechanism has to be used in a particular way so that the player can advance in the game.

Key features:
  • Unique physics puzzle game
  • Easy to understand, difficult to master
  • Atmospheric sounds and visuals
  • Various original soundtracks
  • Full Windows support

This game is the result of 13 weeks of development at the Rotterdam University of Applied Sciences. A team of only 15 students with no experience in programming games are responsible for this game. The project has started on October 29 2018 and will end on January 28 2019.

Follow us on our social media channels to keep updated about our progress! And if you have any feedback, let us know so we can improve the game.

英语*
*具有完全音频支持的语言
